DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to quantify the relations between first & second trimester bleeding and maternal & neonatal morbidity. Additionally, the study will help in assessing the risk for abortions in women with threatened abortions and the risk factors for threatened abortion.
DOC.brief_title: Pregnancy Outcome in Woman With Threatened Abortion
DOC.detailed_description: the study is following woman retrospectively through their pregnancy from the first trimester troughout delivery . we will measure the relation between first and/or second trimester bleeding ( threatend abortion ) and pregnancy outcome ( as written below ) - maternal and neonatal .
DOC.criteria: Women who attended the Emergency department with vaginal bleeding and/or abdominal pain and were on their 20th week of pregnancy or less. Women with any background that can explain vaginal bleeding or any other circumstance that can explain it.
